AddDatabase.title: AddDatabase
AddDatabase.summary: Connects a database hosted on a third-party cloud or an on-premises database to Alibaba Cloud.

AddDatabaseList.title: AddDatabaseList
AddDatabaseList.summary: Adds multiple databases to a database gateway at a time.

CheckDGEnabled.title: CheckDGEnabled
CheckDGEnabled.summary: Queries whether Database Gateway is activated for the current user.

ConnectDatabase.title: ConnectDatabase
ConnectDatabase.summary: Queries whether a database gateway can connect to a database.

CreateGatewayVerifyCode.title: CreateGatewayVerifyCode
CreateGatewayVerifyCode.summary: Generates a verification code that is required for offline gateway installation. This verification code is associated with a specific gateway that is created on the cloud.

DeleteDatabase.title: DeleteDatabase
DeleteDatabase.summary: Deletes a database that is added to a database gateway.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions in which a database gateway can be created.

DownloadGatewayProgram.title: DownloadGatewayProgram
DownloadGatewayProgram.summary: Queries the URL for downloading the Database Gateway agent. All Alibaba Cloud users can download the Database Gateway agent without authentication.

FindUserGatewayById.title: FindUserGatewayById
FindUserGatewayById.summary: Queries the details of a database gateway, including the gateway creator and the number of gateway nodes that are running.

GetUserDatabases.title: GetUserDatabases
GetUserDatabases.summary: Queries a list of databases that are added to a database gateway.

GetUserGatewayInstances.title: GetUserGatewayInstances
GetUserGatewayInstances.summary: Queries the details of a gateway node.

GetUserGateways.title: GetUserGateways
GetUserGateways.summary: Queries a list of database gateways that are created by a user.

ListDatabaseAccessPoint.title: ListDatabaseAccessPoint
ListDatabaseAccessPoint.summary: Queries a list of database access points.

ModifyDatabase.title: ModifyDatabase
ModifyDatabase.summary: Modifies the information about a database, such as the description.

ModifyGateway.title: ModifyGateway
ModifyGateway.summary: Modifies the basic information about a database gateway, including the name and description.

RetryDatabase.title: RetryDatabase
RetryDatabase.summary: Reconnects a database gateway to a database.
